quote: May you live as long as you wish and love as long as you live.
name: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: An anniversary is a reminder as to why you love and married this person.
name: Zoe Foster Blake

quote: There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage.
name: Martin Luther

quote: Love grows more tremendously full, swift, poignant, as the years multiply.
name: Zane Grey

quote: You were made perfectly to be loved - and surely I have loved you, in the idea of you, my whole life long.
name: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: I love being my husband's wife.
name: Julianna Margulies

quote: Marriage is the most natural state of man, and... the state in which you will find solid happiness.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: One should believe in marriage as in the immortality of the soul.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Yes, it was love at first sight. I feel that after all these years, I have finally found my soul mate.
name: Barbara Hershey

quote: May you live all the days of your life.
name: Jonathan Swift

quote: I love my wife, she deserves anything and everything.
name: Aaron Spelling

quote: A lot of good love can happen in ten years.
name: Jim Carrey

quote: The bonds of matrimony are like any other bonds - they mature slowly.
name: Peter De Vries

quote: You marry somebody; you love everything about them. You grow to learn about them. You never learn everything.
name: Chris Daughtry

quote: More marriages might survive if the partners realized that sometimes the better comes after the worse.
name: Doug Larson

quote: That there's no more important decision in life than who you marry.
name: Brad Paisley

quote: Married people from my generation are like an endangered species!
name: Patrice Leconte

quote: Never tell a secret to a bride or a groom; wait until they have been married longer.
name: E. W. Howe

quote: Love is not weakness. It is strong. Only the sacrament of marriage can contain it.
name: Boris Pasternak

quote: I love marriage. I think it's a wonderful institution and it's the most important decision you make.
name: Isla Fisher

quote: So I think you have to marry for the right reasons, and marry the right person.
name: Anne Bancroft

quote: I buried Joel on our 48th anniversary. I had been with her since I was 16.
name: Aaron Neville

quote: Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize the Peace Corps as it reached its 45th anniversary on March 1, 2006.
name: Solomon Ortiz

quote: Are there memories left that are safe from the clutches of phony anniversaries?
name: Pope Paul VI

quote: I've been in love with the same woman for forty-one years. If my wife finds out, she'll kill me.
name: Henny Youngman

quote: I love the institution of marriage, and I love my marriage.
name: Kyle Chandler

quote: Why does a woman work ten years to change a man's habits and then complain that he's not the man she married?
name: Barbra Streisand

quote: June 2005 is the five year anniversary of the debut of Battle Pope.
name: Robert Kirkman

quote: I'm not a big fan of anniversaries.
name: Sam Shepard

quote: And this year is going to be the 25th anniversary of the 17-0 team, the only undefeated season.
name: Don Shula

quote: We celebrate Valentine Day, but no one remembers Bhagat Singh birth anniversary.
name: Yo Yo Honey Singh

quote: Cerner is a company that just celebrated its 20th anniversary in 1999.
name: Neal Patterson

quote: Companies such as Microsoft, Cisco and Intel were just starting at their 10-year anniversary.
name: Jerry Yang

quote: Every year, I am conscious of the anniversary of my 1974 World Trade Center walk.
name: Philippe Petit

quote: John Glenn's anniversaries have followed me all of my life. I was born in 1962, the year he orbited Earth.
name: Gregory H. Johnson

quote: I don't necessarily like anniversaries that much.
name: Jean-Michel Jarre

quote: I want to tell Jamaica, Happy 50th Anniversary.
name: Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce

quote: Since I wrote to you last we have got our chapel beautifully lighted with gas and have had our anniversary.
name: John Hawley
